ygData.subject: Anyone seen a ghost in Erud?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, Just wondering, has anyone seen a bad ass ghost in the woods outside of Erudin?  For fun and a change of pace, I took my lvl 5 Bard over to Erud to
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,
Just wondering, has anyone seen a bad ass ghost in the woods outside of Erudin? For fun and a change of pace, I took my lvl 5 Bard over to Erud to see if there would be any fun hunting. Of course, I got hopelessly lost in the woods. Anyway, in the process of asking directions someone who called me a Heretic came up behind me and clubbed me for 132 pts damage!!! Needless to say, I died but I switched views to see who got me and there was no one there.

Anyone have any ideas?

The Human Bard of Queynos formerly known as Weiland
Now the Half Elf Bard of Freeport presently known as Weiland
Erollosi Marr
